My name is Alexander Portillo. I am 20 years old and in hopes to become an Android Developer. I am currently majoring in Computer Science and also taking the Android Development course at Devslopes. Aside from education, I love going to the gym and playing guitar. I found my passion of playing guitar when I was 10 years of age. I also started going to the gym a year and a half ago. Another thing that I love to do is watch sports. My favorite team in basketball are the Los Angeles Lakers. I try to watch them play every game and currently planning to go to an actual game this year. My favorite football team are the Green Bay Packers just because I have been an Aaron Rodgers fan since a kid.

I have a family of 6. If you are wondering why there is 7 people in the picture, it is because the one to the right is my brother\'s girlfriend. It was the only family picture I can find but we consider her family. I have 3 brothers. The oldest one is Jose, he is 23 years old. He just received his Bachelors Degree. He wants to be a elementary school teacher. My other older brother\'s name is Johnny, he is 21 years old. He is currently pursuing his Bachelor\'s Degree in Business. My youngest brother is Joseph, he is 17 years old. Joseph is currently a senior in highschool and in plans to go to college. My parents names are Alicia and Jose.
